column1: Smoque BBQ////I went to Smoque with a rather large group so I was lucky enough to sample almost everything on the menu! I ordered the brisket platter
column2: which was great. I did use some of the thicker sauce intended for the ribs on it
column3: and it made it even better. Other notables were the baked beans
column4: and peach cobbler. While everything was very good
column5: these two dishes were quite memorable.
